definition: A medium that disseminates information, news, and current affairs to the public through various forms of communication, such as newspapers, magazines, and online platforms. It serves as a primary source of information and is commonly utilized for staying updated on local and global events, politics, entertainment, and other topics of interest.

examples.german: Die Presse berichtete über den Skandal.
examples.english: The press reported on the scandal.

examples.german: Ich habe ein Interview mit der örtlichen Presse gegeben.
examples.english: I gave an interview to the local press.
The press conference was well attended.

examples.german: Die Pressefreiheit ist ein wichtiges demokratisches Prinzip.
examples.english: Press freedom is an important democratic principle.

examples.german: Die Presse hat den neuen Film positiv bewertet.
examples.english: The press reviewed the new movie positively.
